text.tspan: Dandelion-lite - Collection of services to do all blockchain interaction for Cardano making services easy to run
SPO - Stake pool operator - Produce blocks and keep a ledger copy
DBSync - Transfer CBOR data into the PostgresQL database. To make the data easily accessible
GraphQL - Data query and manipulation language - Get information from the chain
Hasura - Build, run, govern, API layer for GraphQl
Assets - PostgresQL table of NFT's and native assets is built by the GraphQL background service
Koios - Elastic RESTful query layer for exploring data on Cardano blockchain
Ogmios - Is a lightweight bridge interface for cardano-node - Transaction submission
DGraph - A fault-tolerant, distributed graph database, rapid scaling.
Zero node - Dgraph Zero controls the Dgraph cluster, and stores information about it.
Alpha node - Replicated from a Zero node.
